A sermon teaching discretion in matters of religion, and touching certayne abuses nowe in the Churche preached at Paules Crosse the 21. of Nouember by Robert Temple Bachelor in Diuinitie sometimes of Magdalene Colledge in Oxforde. Temple, Robert, Bachelor in Diuinitie.
[72] p.
By R. B[ourne] for Edward Aggas, Imprinted at London : 1592.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-D E⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
